title: (x) Racetrack numbers - Clarendon {Lex}
content:
Could anyone please point me out any font that would look like the kind of writing used in those numbers? (I want to write a text with a font that could at least insinuate that was used the same typeface of those numbers)

[http://www.cacofonia.com.br/pista.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526234532/http:/www.cacofonia.com.br/pista.jpg)
author: souljacker

comments.content:
Very nice! Thanks a lot!

Now I’m wondering, what the hell happened to my English skills?

lol
Dunno… have you checked the fridge? :-)
